---
title: "Data import"
output: github_document
---



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

Let's import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data.

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Clean data names 

```{r}
litters_df <- 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

sometimes skimming data is neat

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA",".",""))
```

Look at your data.

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

## import pups data

```{r}
pups_df = 
  read_csv(
    "data/FAS_pups.csv",
    skip=3,
    na = c("NA",".","")
    )
```
